name: DBF Black Box
short_description:
A Java-based project for reading and writing on Xbase -- DBF (dBase III / Clipper) file.

This project is an implementation of JavaDBF:

http://sarovar.org/projects/javadbf/

Credits (JavaDBF):
Anil Kumar K.
Abraham K. Jacob
